long_description: This compact Swix waxing iron has an ergonomic shape that's easy to control, making it excellent for an even wax application to all base materials. Thermostat control maintains constant temperature; indicator light switches on when the desired temperature is reached. Correct temperature melts the hardest waxes without smoking the softest waxes. Clips allow sheets of fiberlene to be attached to iron base for cleaning and removing excess wax from the base. Wired 110 volt.
short_description: This compact Swix waxing iron has an ergonomic shape that's easy to control, making it excellent for an even wax application to all base materials.
